remarks: The identity arrow function is a function from objects to arrows. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
idafval.i $e |- I = ( IdA ` C ) $.
idafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
idafval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
idaf.a $e |- A = ( Arrow ` C ) $.
idaf $p |- ( ph -> I : B --> A ) $.
